scripts.build: pnpm recursive exec -- npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:module && npm run clean:output
scripts.clean:module: rimraf packages/us/node_modules && rimraf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm recursive exec -- rimraf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.clean:output: pnpm recursive exec -- rimraf coverage dist
scripts.init: npm i -g commitizen cz-customizable rimraf && pnpm i -r
scripts.mini: ts-node-esm tasks/mini.ts && pnpm recursive exec -- npm run mount
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run init && npm run build && npm run mini
